Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-52949 affecting package iptraf-ng for versions less than 1.2.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-52949 affecting package iptraf-ng for versions less than 1.2.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package iptraf-ng is earlier than 1.2.2-1, affected by CVE-2024-52949
